column5: Wow....My friend Steve Gaul has been drumming over 100 hours straight to raise money for Cardiac Kids and goes till Wednesday night around 10. He might even break the Guinness Record for Marathon Drumming at the end.  His daughter Jersey, now 2, was born with a Congenial Heart Defect.  You may have seen Steve and his daughter on CP24 last week and Y108 is covering the event throughout the day as well.  Stop by the Burlington Music Centre at 2311 New Street if you live nearby. Good tunes there! http://www.cardiackids.ca/drumathon.shtml
wow !!! awesome great ...i hope he does it and gets the record too....for his daughter
Thanks!  His daughter even has a small drum set beside him and she comes and goes when she feels like it.  She's a trooper
My sister Cindy is doing a story about this for CH news out of Hamilton. It will be on the 6 o'clock news.
I see he is still at it.  How much longer does he have to go?  He has a will of steel !!
Still going and should wrap up around 10 tonight.  I'll be down tonight for my final witness time 4-8 then sticking around till the end.
laszlo - Small world you're sister covered it lol.  She did a great job!

laszlo - Small world you're sister covered it lol.  She did a great job! Impressive Stuff by any standard..am absolutely exhausted after 3 hours of continual play  Heart-Physicality-Musicality-determination and Passion collide on the kit-Thanks for the Post FS  Bravo to All involved here  ID1  p.s. What do you call a guitar player without a girlfriend?  Homeless-Ha
